narration1.content: Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil. After fasting forty days and forty nights, he was hungry.

temptation1.content: The tempter came to him and said, “If you are the Son of God, tell these stones to become bread.”
options: It is written: ‘Man shall not live on bread alone, but on every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

r1.content: Hmm... very wise. (psst! check out Deut 8:3)

temptation2.content: If you are the Son of God,” he said, “throw yourself down. For it is written: 'He will command his angels concerning you, and they will lift you up in their hands, so that you will not strike your foot against a stone.' (psst! Psalm 91:11,12)
options: It is also written: ‘Do not put the Lord your God to the test.’

temptation3.content: All this I will give you,” he said, “if you will bow down and worship me.”
options: Away from me, Satan! For it is written: ‘Worship the Lord your God, and serve him only.’

r3.content: Then the devil left him, and angels came and attended him.
